sentence: Had a problem with the hot water but the maintenance department tried to resolve it
We arrived to be told that the pool was closed down for maintenance and we could use one at another hotel down the road breakfast was a very poor quality cold dry and not at all tasteful
OTHER They are doing maintenance on the elevators so there are only a couple in use so it took forever to get up and down
Our only complaint while staying there was that our refrigerator stopped working on the 2nd or 3rd day and we called twice to have it repaired or replaced and no one ever came
Elevators were slow because of repairs
We passed this info on to the tech who came to fix the TV but we are leaving next day so I have no idea if it was ever repaired correctly
The room was small very worn and needs to be updated and it smelled overwhelmingly like skunk weed
We again complained and was told it had be repaired that day
We are currently staying at the hotel and the upper levels are under renovation
Access is supposed to be controlled with a room key but it has n’t been updated with a new RFID reader which is n’t too big of a concern since the elevators to get the floors are key controlled
Room was recently renovated stay was great
This hotel has been recently refurbished has good rooms with a pleasant decor and good room space
We got to a corner king room that beautifully decorated and updated
Great recently remodeled hotel that is in a good location
Updated renovations were amazing
The renovations to the rooms were expertly done so that the entire hotel seems brand new
Newly remodeled comfy beds and pillows great customer service
Wonderful renovated hotel in walking distance of all the big attractions in NOLAThe room was very clean and quite and the staff was attentive to everything I needed
The hotel was updated nice rooms and public areas
The rooms were recently renovated with a modern touch
